description.value: You increase the frequency of Mummy's Despair to once per 10 minutes instead of once per hour. A creature that critically fails its Will saving throw is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Paralyzed] for 1 round instead of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 2}. Mummy's Despair gains the incapacitation trait.
